recommendations: Consider adding a Settings page route to handle the 404 warning
The frequency badge colors could include monthly (amber) when data supports it

visualFidelity.notes: Excellent match to design examples - sidebar, cards, modal, header all match the target design

buildSuccess.notes: Build passes with no TypeScript errors, compiles in 1.58s

componentConsistency.notes: Consistent design system across all components, proper use of Tailwind classes

responsiveness.notes: Two-column grid layout works on xl screens, responsive breakpoints implemented

codeQuality.notes: Clean TypeScript code, proper component structure, reusable Badge helpers

summary: The UI redesign successfully matches the design examples with high fidelity. All major components (Sidebar, Header, TaskCard, TaskForm, TaskList) have been updated to use the new design system with Inter font, Material Icons, indigo primary color, and proper spacing. The build compiles without errors and the visual verification confirmed all checkpoints pass.
